%%{FinTech_LedgerService}
  }
}%%
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
    participant Settler
    participant Issuer 1
    participant Issuer 2 ... Issuer N
    participant Payer
    activate Settler
      Settler->>Settler: Generates preimage=key
      Settler->>Settler: Encrypts the message with the key 
      Settler->>Payer:encrypted message
      Settler->>Settler: Computes payment hash for the preimage  
      Settler->>Issuer 1: invoice(FinTech_PaymentGateway) 
    deactivate Settler
    activate Issuer 1
      Issuer 1->>Issuer 2 ... Issuer N: invoice(FinTech_AuthVault) 
    deactivate Issuer 1
    activate Issuer 2 ... Issuer N
      Issuer 2 ... Issuer N->>Payer: invoice(FinTech_PaymentGateway) 
    deactivate Issuer 2 ... Issuer N
    activate Payer
      Payer->>Issuer 2 ... Issuer N:pay(FinTech_AuthVault)
    deactivate Payer
    activate Issuer 2 ... Issuer N
      Issuer 2 ... Issuer N->>Issuer 1:pay(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    deactivate Issuer 2 ... Issuer N
    activate Issuer 1
      Issuer 1->>Settler:pay(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    deactivate Issuer 1
    activate Settler
      par
        Settler->>Issuer 1:preimage
      and
        Settler->>Issuer 2 ... Issuer N:preimage
      and
        Settler->>Payer:preimage=key
        activate Payer
          Payer->>Payer:decrypt message with the key
        deactivate Payer
      end
    deactivate Settler
